subject: Re: Reminder: Order #SSN3826, how did it go?
description_text:
My order hasn't even arrived yet

conversations.body_text: Hi Val Bor Eržen,    I apologize for not responding to you promptly. Due to a high volume of emails, we overlooked yours. I reviewed all messages and found your inquiry. I see your package has been delivered—have you received it?  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=84150004825045
